column2: Construct an ontology focused on the following: people. Provide it in valid Turtle/RDF format, excluding any extra text.
column3: ```@prefix rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> .@prefix rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> .@prefix owl: <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> .@prefix xsd: <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> .@prefix people: <http://example.org/people#> .people:Person rdf:type owl:Class ;  rdfs:label "Person"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Class representing human beings"@en . people:name rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;  rdfs:label "has name"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Represents personal name of the individual"@en ;  rdfs:domain people:Person ;  rdfs:range xsd:string .people:age rdf:type owl:DatatypeProperty ;  rdfs:label "has age"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Represents age of the individual"@en ;  rdfs:domain people:Person ;  rdfs:range xsd:int .people:hasSibling rdf:type owl:ObjectProperty ;  rdfs:label "has sibling"@en ;  rdfs:comment "Represents sibling relation between individuals"@en ;  rdfs:domain people:Person ;  rdfs:range people:Person . ```
